name: Pleston Solutions
description:
Pleston Solutions is a young and dynamic computer company, with the sufficient experience of the professionals that form it to develop and provide state-of-the-art technological solutions adapted to the needs of our customers with the highest quality and lowest cost.
You know your business, we know the technology, for this reason we want to be your technological partner to be able to incorporate the best and most modern practices that best suit your needs.
